subject: Football
College Athletics
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: President-elect Barack Obama should deliver an ultimatum to college presidents, conference commissioners and bowl representatives: come up with a playoff system, or give up the bogus tax-exempt status they have enjoyed for so long.
snippet: President-elect Barack Obama should deliver an ultimatum to college presidents, conference commissioners and bowl representatives: come up with a playoff system, or give up the bogus tax-exempt status they have enjoyed for so long.
